channel.title: How come this doesnt work?
channel.description:
so i used this tut to edit my npcs damages http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457701.msg3349622.html#msg3349622
but it only works for my abyssal demon, any other npc i try it for, it doesnt work! i quadruple checked, everything is in place! do i need to add something else for other npcs? ive been trying to find whats wrong with this for 2 months already, but i dont see anything wrong with it!

item.title: How come this doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

no errors when compiled
i went through the tut 4 times, checked the codes 4 times
im not going to make it so they hit 99…
they are going to be part of a boss battle
i changed the npc ids, but it still doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: How come this doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Did you get any errors when you compiled the source?

Read full topic

item.title: How come this doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:1, topic:367596”]so i used this tut to edit my npcs damages

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

but it only works for my abyssal demon, any other npc i try it for, it doesnt work!
i quadruple checked, everything is in place! do i need to add something else for other npcs?[/quote]
If you follow that tutorial carefully , you should come up with no errors/problems, It works 100%.

Read full topic

item.title: How come this doesnt work?
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“stickywicky, post:2, topic:367596”]changing what npcs hit you should really change…
think of players that dont know mutch about rs and they try kills things with rubbish armour theyll keep getting owned causing them toi get bored of your server
so my advice
:
dont change[/quote]
Just help him with what he has a question about. Anyways, did you change the npc id when you tried to do this for other monsters? (ie you gotta change “1615” in the snippets to the id of the npc you are trying to edit) If that is not the issue, make sure that the npc you are trying to add isn’ t already in the file, in that case just edit the pre existing code.

Read full topic

so my advice
